Blog.post: urlLink iPods Around the World - Welcome ! .... I want an iPod really bad!!!

urlLink Pluck: Search, Retrieve, Organize & Share the Web ..... This could be useful if you read a lot of news sites or blogs... just have all of them brought to you instead of you having to go to them.

urlLink Freesticky: An index of free web site content, free content providers and self publishing resources. News feeds, financial content, jokes, royalty free photos and images, free articles, tickers, weather, games, comics, riddles and mo ..... If you are a webmaster you need this site.
urlLink Free Internet Browsers Downloads ..... Here are some browser downloads you might want to try.

urlLink Adult Group Finder Galleries, Bondacge , Stockings, Lingerie, Sexy Women, Free Pictures and Erotica ..... Find all the adult yahoo groups you need right here. urlLink Cyber Group List is another group site you may check out. Does anyone know of a group site that is dedicated to MSN adult groups?

urlLink NoRecordLabel.com - Promote your music online for FREE ..... In my search for websites offering free techno mp3's I found this site... it's for unsigned music artist's looking to promote their music.... and this site lets you do it for free.... so if your in a band you need to sign up here... it might help you get famous some day.... and for those of you interested in some new tunes check out this site.
urlLink Maximum Rotation: Dance Music and DJ Culture ..... something for techno fans!!

urlLink CELEBRITY TATTOOS :: Tattooed celebrities, historical figures, supermodels, sports stars, rock stars, pictures and images as well! ..... Wanna know which of your favorite actors/actresses have tattoo's? You may know of many of them who do but this list might surprise you with the one's you don't know about.
urlLink dudesnude dudes nude ..... cool dudes ..... hot pictures.

urlLink Art Supplies from Dick Blick Art Materials ..... Dick Blick is a wonderful art supply company. You can get a free catalog from them that show's off thier products wonderfully. If your an artist and haven't discovered Dick Blick yet then maybe it's time you did.

urlLink AllPosters.com - The World's Largest Poster and Print Store! ..... So you just moved into that dull ass college dorm room and wally world and k-mart's poster selection sucks with all thier suck-ass kiddy posters and you need some really cool posters to liven up your room well then you need AllPosters.com because they have every freakin' poster you can imagine on this planet!

urlLink MOVIE Wallpaper new releases, upcoming movies, free movie wallpapers ..... Holy crap Batman!! There are some very cool movie wallpapers at this site, but a warning though... it takes awhile to load if your on dial up.
urlLink Polymer Clay - CONTINENTAL CLAY COMPANY ..... If you like working with clay like I do then here is a site to order clay and clay working tools.

urlLink Squarespace - Introduction ..... If your looking for an easierway to publish your website (blog included), you just found it. Squarespace lets you publish a multi-page, blog-enabled, webstie without having to any HTML.
urlLink runboard.com - Free online hosted message boards and forums ..... Check out runboard.com if your looking for a free message board for your site.
urlLink For The Love Of Beads ..... They not only have a great selection of beads but their site layout is cool too.
urlLink Home - WindowsMedia.com Media Guide ..... Current Events, Movies, Music news.
urlLink Tribals.com :: TRIBAL TATTOOS, TATTOOS, CELEBRITY TATTOOS AND MORE...! ..... Looking for tribal tattoo's? Give this page a try.
urlLink Caleb's Light House ..... jewelry supplies.

urlLink Craft supplies, scrapbooking and sewing at discount prices ï¿½ CreateForLess ..... I've never ordered from this site (yet) but they seem to have some pretty decent prices on ton's of craft supplies. They do have a minimum purchase requirement on some items but you can always buy in bulk and then resell the quantities you don't need....... that's what ebay is for ya know.
urlLink Wholesale Closeout Jewlery Making Suppies - ton's of beads to choose from ..... You could spend all day looking through these beads.
urlLink PHP Scripts ..... If you need a pen pal script you can go here to get it.
urlLink Chris Geary ..... Hold on to your seats boys!
urlLink ShopTaxi.com - Shop online with a new find every half hour ..... This could be fun if you really enjoy shopping. This site updates every half hour with a new gift product.

urlLink Official Animotion Web Site ..... Remember that song "Obsession" by the band called Animotion from back "in the day" early 80's. I found their website and it appears they are still on the music scene.
urlLink del pinto art work ..... Welcome to the world of art.

urlLink Kato PolyClay ..... I have seen this clay at Hobby Lobby but I have never tried it. The website says it's supposed to be some pretty good stuff... Maybe I'll try it out someday when I use up all my Sculpey clay.
urlLink Do It Yourself ..... This is a really cool website with lot's of do it yourself projects. No rainy day should be spent without D-I-Y!!!

urlLink Happy Mango Beads, African Trade Beads, Glass Beads, also recycled, stone, millefiore, bone, old, sand cast, chevron, and more at discount prices ..... This bead company has some really really cool beads and a large selection to choose from. Even if your not into beading you should check out this site. You might get hooked on a new hobby.

urlLink Polymer clay beads from Primitive Earth Beads ..... One of my favorite hobbies is making small beads from polymer clay. I wanted to see if anyone out there in the world makes the same kind of beads that I make so I went google searching. I didn't find any beads like mine, but I found these and boy they sure are neat.
urlLink Sequins ..... Need leaf sequins to make a wire tree... get them here.
urlLink Home Page ..... I found this company while searching ebay for plant seeds. They have some amazing silk plants and trees.
urlLink Botanical Growers Network: Alocasia Odora "Homescape" ..... This link is really for me because I want one of these plants.

urlLink Seeds from Whatcom Seed Company - Catalog of Rare, Exotic, Unusual Garden Seeds ..... Are you a gardener? Do you like exotic plants? Order exotic plant seeds from seedrack.com and make your home or garden look cool.
urlLink Beaded Flowers - Beadwork by Caren ..... Whoever thought beads and horticulture could be so cool together?

urlLink Beaded Tree Tutorial - Kimberly Chapman's Beading ..... I found this awesome beaded tree tutorial while looking for idea's on how to decorate a small tree out in my front yard. When I read this tutorial I imagined making a large droopy willow tree sculpture to place on a patio table..... check out this page, it might inspire you to do something you've never done before. I know I can't wait to make one.

urlLink ShooshTime.com - Brittany Spears is really a man! ..... This site takes awhile to load if your on dial up but there is always some funny stuff to see..... hellava lota links to other sites too.
urlLink JustUsBoys.com - The Back Door To The Gay Web! ..... A directory of gay porn sites.

urlLink Dudes Off Campus - Amateur and Exhibitionist Pix and Videos ..... Dudes Off Campus is for gay, bisexual and straight dudes and ladies who love amateur guys. Awesoome FREE picture galleries of some good looking amateur men. This site is one of the best.
urlLink Rate My Cock ..... You've seen those rate-a-pic sites... now you get to rate men's private parts..... more dick than you'll ever care to see lol.

urlLink Create A Form ..... Need a form for your website.... maybe a questionnaire? Create A Form website will give you one free form... just fill out some information and they will create a form for you that you can plug into your site.... I think I'll try this out when I make my boyfriend application when I get my next domain.
urlLink Good-Tutorials.com - 3248 Adobe Photoshop Tutorials ..... Learn some new skills with photoshop!

urlLink DeskMod Lite - Temporary DeskMod Community Site ..... Some sort of community site..... I think..... I'm just plugging it because there's some interesting looking links at the bottom of the page.
urlLink DanceRecords.com
urlLink ModBlog - Blogging Redefined ...... Blogger.com is not the only free blogging service around. Check out ModBlog..... they have some neat blogging templates.
urlLink BradsHouse.com ...... Brad has a nice little gallery page you should check out.
urlLink ::: YoungMuscleboys.com ::: ..... WARNING!! - This site takes awhile to load if your on dial up (like me) but there are some hot galleries and links to check out.
urlLink Bored.com ..... Ok folks here is a site that promises to never let you down when you need to find something to do..... all kinds of crazy stuff there.
urlLink Gallery :: your photos on your website ..... This is by far the best photo gallery script I've seen on the web.
urlLink Weblogs.Com: Recently Updated Weblogs .... Go here and you will find a really llloooooonnnnggggg list of the most recently updated blogs.

urlLink Weblogs.Com: Recently Updated Weblogs ..... Go here and you will find a looooonnnnnnggggg ass list of the most recently updated blogs..... More fucking blogs than you will ever care to read but if you sift through them a bit you can always find some really cool sites.

urlLink Photobucket Image Hosting and Free Online Photo Albums ....... I haven't tried this one out yet but it looks like it could come in handy if you need to post pictures to message boards or just need a place to store some images on the web.
urlLink craftster.org - crafty hipsters share clever ideas ..... This is a really cool forum for all your crafting needs.

urlLink The Sect of Homokaasu - The Rasterbator ..... I so totally want to try this. Imagine taking a small picture and making it large enough to cover a whole wall in your bedroom.... well that's what the rasterbator will do for you. Check out the rasterbator gallery to see some awesome posters people have already made. This would be a totally cool thing to do on a shitty rainy day.... just make sure your printer cartridges are full.

Hi, well I decided to start this new blog after I lost my old domain. I missed having my own spot on the web so here I am with this little link log thing. I always come across some really interesting sites out there when I'm surfing the web and I will be linking them all here for you to check out. Have fun!!
urlLink Military dog tags, Military name dogtags, custom id tags and other dogtags sold. check out these cool dog tags.

urlLink SMaQ - "Sex, Men and Queers" ..... they claim to be the "ultimate gay directory"..... and while the site is pretty good it just doesn't seem to be all that it could be but you might find something of interest if you give it a try.
urlLink East West: Top 30 Gay Blogs ..... I'm saving this link mainly for myself so I can find the blogs later for a website I plan on building in the near future.
urlLink Dava Bead & Trade ..... I haven't looked this site over completely yet but it looks like they may have some wonderful beads if your into making jewelry.
urlLink eParty Unlimited - the leader in glow and lighted novelties, dance, and other innovative party supplies. ..... This site has everything you need to make your next party/rave a hit.
